ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hey, I’m Nawied! After more than 15 years in the German Armed Forces, I discovered my passion for programming especially in frontend development. I love turning creative ideas into visible code while working in a structured, solution-oriented way and within a team. What motivates me is the constant change in IT: new technologies, tools, and frameworks inspire me every day to learn more and improve. I see problems as opportunities to find the best solution through analytical thinking, perseverance, and creativity.

LOCATION.TEXT: I live near Unna and am open to remote work as well as potential relocations.

MINDSET.TEXT: I am open-minded and passionate about learning new technologies and continuously improving my skills.

APPROACH.TEXT: I solve problems analytically and creatively, always aiming for the most efficient and elegant solution.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.INTRO: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in webdevelopment.
SKILLS.PITCH_TEXT: Feel free to reach out. I look forward to expanding my knowledge.
SKILLS.INTEREST: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.TITLE: Selected Projects
PROJECTS.INTRO: Explore a selection of my work - interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

ELPOLLOLOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
ELPOLLOLOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What Clients Say
TESTIMONIALS.INTRO: Hear from those I've worked with about their experiences collaborating with me.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let’s Work Together
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.INTRO: I’m looking forward to supporting your projects with my work.
